plays.text: Goal scored by Rico Fata assisted by MATTIAS JOHANSSON
Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for Slashing Steve McKenna served by Eric Weinrich
Goal scored by MATTIAS JOHANSSON assisted by Mario Lemieux and Dan Focht
Goal scored by Eric Desjardins assisted by Mark Recchi and John LeClair
Penalty to Hans Jonsson 2 minutes for Interference Keith Primeau served by Hans Jonsson
Penalty to Kirby Law 2 minutes for Boarding Richard Lintner served by Kirby Law
Penalty to Dan Focht 2 minutes for Hooking Keith Primeau served by Dan Focht
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Mark Recchi and Dmitry Yushkevich
Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Holding Keith Primeau served by Shawn Heins
Penalty to Donald Brashear 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Meloche served by Donald Brashear
Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Guillaume Lefebvre served by Eric Weinrich
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Interference Eric Weinrich served by Ville Nieminen
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Michal Handzus and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Eric Desjardins 2 minutes for High Sticking Martin Straka served by Eric Desjardins
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Guillaume Lefebvre
Goal scored by Tony Amonte assisted by Eric Desjardins and Jeremy Roenick
